DOC.criteria: Male female person use effective contraceptive method , negative urine pregnancy test inclusion visit woman reproductive age . Older 30 year younger 65 year BMI ≤ 30 Score great 30 Cohen perceive stress scale PSS 14 . Score 5 20 Hamilton anxiety scale ( exclude limit ) . Presenting impact stress least one follow domain . pain domain score great 20 millimeter measure visual pain evaluation scale , physical condition domain score great 50 Prevost subjective fatigue scale , psychical condition domain global score 160 Stroop test reverse Stroop test . Stable professional activity since least 1 year . Completely healthy day inclusion , take medicinal product dietary supplement antistress antipain objective . Not take herbal tea drink antistress antipain objective . Accepting modify his/her dietary habit . Having give his/her free , informed express consent . Capable understanding nature objective , consequence study accept comply protocol requirement . Affiliated social security insurance beneficiary insurance system . Subject present acute pain pain consider incapacitating patient him/herself observer physician . Subject currently chronic acute treatment indicate stress anxiety , irrespective treatment . Subject currently chronic acute treatment indicate pain problem , irrespective treatment . Pregnant and/or breastfeed woman . Any person satisfy definition inclusion criterion . Adult protect law . Any history psychiatric disease . Any pathology progress active previous month . Any administration dietary supplement progress previous month . Any subject within 3 month follow inclusion likely experience major modification his/her life rhythm ( For example marriage , birth child , schedule hospitalization , important exam , etc . ) leave discretion investigator .
